name: Flora Growth Corp.
description: Flora Growth Corp. is a Canadian-based company focused on the cultivation, manufacturing, and distribution of cannabis products. Established in 2021, Flora operates globally with a commitment to delivering high-quality, organic cannabis and hemp-derived products. The company is dedicated to sustainable practices, promoting environmentally friendly cultivation methods while ensuring compliance with regulations across various markets. Flora Growth has a diverse portfolio that includes a range of cannabis-based wellness products, including oils, topicals, and edibles, catering to both recreational and medicinal consumers. The company's mission is to enhance the quality of life for its customers through innovative products that harness the therapeutic properties of cannabis. Flora's cultivation facilities are designed to maximize efficiency and sustainability, contributing to the growing cannabis industry while also focusing on research and development to explore new therapeutic applications of cannabis. The company is strategically positioned to take advantage of the expanding global cannabis market, leveraging its expertise and innovative approach to capture market share and drive growth.
